titles: New propositions propounded at the Kings royall court at Holmby, betwixt the Kings Most Excellent Majesty, and Mr. Marshall and Mr. Caryll concerning the presbyteriall government, the Booke of Common-Prayer, and the directory : also His Majesties severall reasons, concerning episcopacy, and Mr. Marshalls reply for the cleering His Majesties objections : together with divers remarkable passages of the Commissioners of the kingdome of Scotland, propounded to His Majesty for his royall assent to the propositions, and signing the Covenant : with another message from His Majesty at Holmby, to both Houses of Parliament.
author: Marshall, Stephen, 1594?-1655.
Caryll, John, 1625-1711.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Scotland. Parliament.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Church of England. --  Book of common prayer.
